malaria: Malaria is caused by mosquito bites. Prevent it by sleeping under nets, using repellents, and keeping water containers covered.
vaccination: Vaccinations help prevent diseases like measles, polio, and hepatitis. Consult your nearest PHC for schedule updates.
dengue: Dengue spreads through Aedes mosquitoes. Symptoms include fever, joint pain, and rash. Keep surroundings clean and avoid water stagnation.
covid: COVID-19 spreads through respiratory droplets. Wash hands often, wear masks in crowded areas, and keep vaccinations up to date.
